content.rendered:
Treat Your Feet to Blissful Care

At York Street Spa, we understand that your feet deserve special attention and care. Our pedicure services are designed to provide your feet with the ultimate pampering experience, leaving them refreshed, beautiful, and ready to carry you through life’s journey.

Spa Pedicure: Revitalize Your Feet

Indulge in our Spa Pedicure, a rejuvenating experience that brings comfort and relaxation to your tired feet. We believe that taking care of your feet is essential not only for their health but also for your overall well-being.

Spa pedicure:

$85

Deluxe pedicure:

$105

Express pedicure:

$49

biosculpture pedicure:

$130

add-on shellac:

$18

add-on SHELLAC removal:

$10

add-on paraffin treatment:

$25

What to Expect with Our Spa Pedicure

Foot Soak:

Begin your pedicure with a soothing foot soak to soften your skin and prepare your feet for pampering.

Nail Shaping:

Our skilled technicians will expertly shape your nails, ensuring they are trimmed to perfection.

Cuticle Care:

We gently tend to your cuticles, promoting healthy and well-maintained nails.

Exfoliation:

A gentle exfoliating treatment removes dead skin cells, leaving your feet feeling soft and smooth.

Hydration:

Enjoy a relaxing foot and leg massage that deeply hydrates your skin, providing nourishment and relief.

Nail Polish:

Choose from our selection of high-quality nail polishes to add a touch of elegance to your pedicure.

Our Unique Spa Pedicure Services

Deluxe Spa Pedicure: Luxury for Your Feet

Elevate your pedicure experience with our Deluxe Spa Pedicure. This enhanced treatment includes all the elements of our Spa Pedicure, along with additional indulgent steps to ensure your feet receive the royal treatment they deserve.

Refresh Polish Express Pedi: Quick Beauty for Busy Days

For those on the go, our Refresh Polish Express Pedi offers a quick yet effective way to keep your feet looking beautifully polished and well-groomed.

Gel Pedicure: Long-Lasting Beauty

Our Gel Pedicure is perfect for those seeking lasting beauty. Enjoy vibrant colors and durability that will keep your toenails looking flawless.

Paraffin Wax: Deep Moisturization and Softness

Experience the soothing effects of Paraffin Wax, which deeply moisturizes your feet, leaving them feeling soft and rejuvenated.

Foot Detox: Cleanse and Recharge

Our Foot Detox treatment is designed to help cleanse your feet, promoting a sense of well-being and relaxation.

Add-Ons: Tailor Your Pedicure

Enhance your pedicure experience with our add-ons, which include options like French polish, nail art, or nail repair. Customize your pedicure to suit your preferences and style.

At York Street Spa, we invite you to discover the beauty of well-cared-for feet. Our pedicure services are a treat for your feet and a delight for your spirit.

Book your pedicure appointment today and step into a world of comfort and elegance.
